game.beginning: In a world ravaged by an ancient cataclysm, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The last remnants of civilization are scattered across a barren wasteland, with factions vying for power and resources.
game.ending: When the secrets are revealed and the threat is neutralized, the survivors must unite to rebuild. However, peace proves uneasy as some seek to exploit the situation.
game.synopsis: Echoes of Eternity follows Aria, a young survivor, on her quest to reclaim her world with an ancient technology. She embarks on a perilous journey, encountering allies and enemies alike, in a race against time to secure a brighter future.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
